plot: Teacher B.T. Cates is arrested for teaching Darwin's theories. Famous lawyer Henry Drummond defends him; fundamentalist politician Matthew Brady prosecutes. This is a very thinly disguised rendition of the 1925 &"Scopes monkey trial&" with debates between Clarence Darrow and William Jennings Bryan taken largely from the transcripts.   Written by  Ed Stephan
title: La herencia del viento
